languages.text: "В том нет моей заслуги — они сами выбирают этот путь. Я лишь указываю на то, что он открыт каждому, и наставляю тех, кто встал на тропу искупления. Так нас учил святой Друз".

traits.locale_text: "В том нет мой заслуги — они сами выбирают этот путь. Я лишь указываю на то, что он открыт каждому, и наставляю тех, кто встал на тропу искупления. Так нас учил святой Друз".
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: "I take no credit for that. They choose that path for themselves. I merely point out that the path is open to all, and instruct those who have started their journey to redemption. For thus Saint Drusus taught us."
languages.original_text: "В том нет моей заслуги — они сами выбирают этот путь. Я лишь указываю на то, что он открыт каждому, и наставляю тех, кто встал на тропу искупления. Так нас учил святой Друз".

traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: “这并不是我的功劳，而是他们自己选择的道路。我只是让他们意识到，这条道路向所有人敞开。我会为那些已经踏上救赎之旅的人提供指引，圣德鲁苏斯就是这样教导我们的。”
languages.original_text: "I take no credit for that. They choose that path for themselves. I merely point out that the path is open to all, and instruct those who have started their journey to redemption. For thus Saint Drusus taught us."

traits.locale_text: “这并不是我的功劳，而是他们自己选择的道路。我只是让他们意识到，这条道路向所有人敞开。我会为那些已经踏上救赎之旅的人提供指引，圣德鲁苏斯就是这样教导我们的。”
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: 「それは私の責任ではない。彼ら自身が選んだ道だ。私はただ、道が存在すると教え、贖罪への旅を始めた者には指導をしてきた。これこそが、聖ドルススの教えだ」
languages.original_text: "I take no credit for that. They choose that path for themselves. I merely point out that the path is open to all, and instruct those who have started their journey to redemption. For thus Saint Drusus taught us."

traits.locale_text: 「それは私の責任ではない。彼ら自身が選んだ道だ。私はただ、道が存在すると教え、贖罪への旅を始めた者には指導をしてきた。これこそが、聖ドルススの教えだ」
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: «No me atribuyo ningún mérito, eligen ese camino por sí mismos. Simplemente señalo que el camino está abierto a todos e instruyo a aquellos que han comenzado su viaje hacia la redención, porque así nos lo enseñó san Drusus».
languages.original_text: "I take no credit for that. They choose that path for themselves. I merely point out that the path is open to all, and instruct those who have started their journey to redemption. For thus Saint Drusus taught us."

traits.locale_text: «No me atribuyo ningún mérito, eligen ese camino por sí mismos. Simplemente señalo que el camino está abierto a todos e instruyo a aquellos que han comenzado su viaje hacia la redención, porque así nos lo enseñó san Drusus».
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: "Das ist nicht mein Verdienst. Sie haben diesen Pfad selbst gewählt. Ich zeige ihnen lediglich, dass dieser Pfad allen offensteht, und unterweise jene, die ihre Reise zur Erlösung begonnen haben. Denn das ist die Lehre des Heiligen Drusus."
languages.original_text: "I take no credit for that. They choose that path for themselves. I merely point out that the path is open to all, and instruct those who have started their journey to redemption. For thus Saint Drusus taught us."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist nicht mein Verdienst. Sie haben diesen Pfad selbst gewählt. Ich zeige ihnen lediglich, dass dieser Pfad allen offensteht, und unterweise jene, die ihre Reise zur Erlösung begonnen haben. Denn das ist die Lehre des Heiligen Drusus."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: « Oh, mais je n'y suis pour rien. C'est un chemin qu'ils ont eux-mêmes choisi d'emprunter. Tout ce que j'ai fait, c'est signifier que cette voie était ouverte à tous et instruire ceux qui ont fait le premier pas, comme Saint Drusus nous l'a appris. »
languages.original_text: "I take no credit for that. They choose that path for themselves. I merely point out that the path is open to all, and instruct those who have started their journey to redemption. For thus Saint Drusus taught us."

traits.locale_text: « Oh, mais je n'y suis pour rien. C'est un chemin qu'ils ont eux-mêmes choisi d'emprunter. Tout ce que j'ai fait, c'est signifier que cette voie était ouverte à tous et instruire ceux qui ont fait le premier pas, comme Saint Drusus nous l'a appris. »
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: "Kendime pay biçemem. Bu yolu kendileri seçtiler. Ben yalnızca bu yolun herkese açık olduğunu gösteriyorum ve kefaret yoluna baş koymuş olanlara kılavuzluk ediyorum. Tıpkı Aziz Drusus'un bize tembihlediği gibi."
languages.original_text: "I take no credit for that. They choose that path for themselves. I merely point out that the path is open to all, and instruct those who have started their journey to redemption. For thus Saint Drusus taught us."

traits.locale_text: "Kendime pay biçemem. Bu yolu kendileri seçtiler. Ben yalnızca bu yolun herkese açık olduğunu gösteriyorum ve kefaret yoluna baş koymuş olanlara kılavuzluk ediyorum. Tıpkı Aziz Drusus'un bize tembihlediği gibi."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04
